News: Presented my doctoral work at the first PMRF National Symposium.
Our work is featured on the news portal and Linkedin profile of Lyles School of Civil Engineering.

Our paper "On the Approximation of Cooperative Heterogeneous Multi Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) via Mean Field Control (MFC)" has been selected for the best paper award at the NeurIPS Workshop of Cooperative AI.
Joined Purdue University as a post-doctoral researcher.
